description:
She looks like a sweet little girl, but is actually half fox demon and half human. Her bushy tail is always sticking out from behind. She is a tomboy with an unyielding spirit, but has long lived as a social outcast because she is half demon. She meets http://anidb.net/ch65416 [Keiichirou] and starts to change as she develops an affection for him.
Source: ANN
name: Chiharu
